title: C Level 10 â€” File Handling & Mini Projects
intro: This level teaches basic file input/output and applies all concepts in mini projects.
points: Understand FILE pointer and file modes like "r", "w", "a".
Use fopen, fprintf, fscanf, fputs, fgets, fclose in simple examples.
Read from and write to text files.
Combine arrays, structures, and files in a single program.
Plan and implement a small C project using all learned concepts.
